Package index

All functions

AGBref
Global Reference Dataset for Above-Ground Biomass (AGBref)

Generate AGB tile names
Accuracy()
Calculate accuracy metrics for AGB estimates
BBvar()
Calculate block-to-block semivariogram

Create a binned plot of AGB data
BiomePair()
Assign ecological zones and continents to plot locations
Deforested()
Remove deforested plots by overlaying plots with Global Forest Change data

Generate ESA-CCI AGB tile names

Analyze AGB shift in bins
HistoTemp()
Visualize histogram of temporal fix effect

Create a square polygon (block) based on input coordinates and size

Format tree-level data from nested plots

Create polygons from plot coordinates

Generate AGB SD tile names

Create a scatter plot of AGB data

Calculate spatial standard deviation at 0.1 degrees resolution

Compute weighted AGB by strata

Generate tree cover tile names

Apply temporal adjustment to plot biomass

Apply temporal adjustment and compute temporal variance in plot biomass

Calculate temporal variance in plot biomass

Calculate the GFC product tiles needed for a given area

Check and covert plt input

Compute tree cover forest mask for a specific year
